description: Billing coordinator asks LegalBillAI to resend a previously emailed invoice after a delivery failure; the AI retrieves the stored PDF path, resends the email, logs the action, and confirms completion.

messages.content: You are LegalBillAI, an AI-driven legal billing assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch invoice data, resend emails, and record audit logs. Always confirm actions with the user.
Hi LegalBillAI, the invoice we sent to Acme Corp for March 2025 (invoice #INV-2025-03-001) bounced back. Please resend it to john.doe@acmecorp.com.
Sure, I will resend invoice #INV-2025-03-001 to john.doe@acmecorp.com and record the action.

arguments.subject: Invoice #INV-2025-03-001 – Resend
arguments.body:
Dear John Doe,

messages.content: The invoice has been resent to john.doe@acmecorp.com. The email was sent successfully (Message ID: msg-7890) and the action has been logged for audit purposes.
